sponsors.name: Tech Career North
sponsors.description: Tech Career North is a go-to hub for Canada's tech enthusiasts, students, and career changers with internships and entry level tech job postings manually curated DAILY. Join the server for your next opportunity and connect with peers nationwide in Canada!

sponsors.name: Amazon AWS
sponsors.description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world's most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud, offering over 200 fully featured services from data centers globally. Millions of customers—including the fastest-growing startups, largest enterprises, and leading government agencies—are using AWS to lower costs, become more agile, and innovate faster.
